Ext.layout.container.Table Example

Tags: Ext JS Ext JS 4.0.7 Ext.layout.container.Table Ext.layout.TableLayout table columns layout container
[example]
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function () {
    Ext.create('Ext.panel.Panel', {
        title: 'Table Layout',
        width: 300,
        height: 150,
        layout: {
            type: 'table',
            // The total column count must be specified here
            columns: 3
        },
        defaults: {
            // applied to each contained panel
            bodyStyle: 'padding:20px'
        },
        items: [{
            html: 'Cell A content',
            rowspan: 2
        }, {
            html: 'Cell B content',
            colspan: 2
        }, {
            html: 'Cell C content',
            cellCls: 'highlight'
        }, {
            html: 'Cell D content'
        }],
        renderTo: Ext.getBody()
    });
});
